displayName.japanese: アーサー・ヘイスト・イング

description.french: Prendre du Phlash en tant qu'Arthur.
description.japanese: アーサーでフラッシュを摂取する
description.spanish: Consume velocín como Arthur.

displayName.english: A Bit of The Old Ultraviolence
displayName.spanish: Una ración de ultraviolencia de la antigua

description.brazilian: Mate 100 PNJs ao longo de todo o jogo
description.english: Kill 100 NPCs in a single playthrough
description.french: Tuer 100 PNJ dans toutes les parties.
description.italian: Uccidi 100 PNG in totale nelle tue partite
description.japanese: 全てのストーリーを合わせて累計100人殺す
description.russian: Убить 100 неигровых персонажей во всей игре.
description.schinese: 在整个游戏流程中杀死100名非玩家角色。
description.spanish: Asesina a 100 PNJ en el juego.

description.brazilian: Ouça todas as ligações nas cabines telefônicas.
description.english: Listen to all the phone calls in the phoneboxes
description.french: Écouter tous les appels téléphoniques dans les cabines.
description.german: Höre dir alle Anrufe in den Telefonzellen an.
description.italian: Ascolta tutte le telefonate nelle cabine.
description.japanese: 公衆電話ですべての通話を聞く
description.russian: Прослушать все звонки в телефонных будках.
description.schinese: 接听电话亭的所有电话。
description.spanish: Escucha todas las llamadas en las cabinas de teléfono.

description.brazilian: Mate um cara chamado Ryan Andrews.
description.english: Kill a guy named Ryan Andrews
description.french: Tuer un type nommé Ryan Andrews.
description.german: Töte einen Mann namens Ryan Andrews.
description.italian: Uccidi un tizio di nome Ryan Andrews.
description.japanese: ライアン・アンドリューズという名の男を殺す
description.russian: Убить парня по имени Райан Эндрюс.
description.schinese: 杀死一个叫莱安·安德鲁斯的家伙。
description.spanish: Asesina a un tipo llamado Ryan Andrews.

description.english: Retrieve the credentials from the club
description.french: Retrouver l'autorisation dans le club.
description.german: Hol dir die Berechtigungen vom Club.
description.japanese: クラブから身分証を回収する
description.spanish: Recupera las credenciales del club.

description.brazilian: Conclua todas as missões de aprendiz de açougueiro
description.english: Finish all of the butcher's apprentice quests
description.french: Vous avez terminé toutes les quêtes d'apprenti-boucher.
description.german: Schließe alle Quests des Metzgerlehrlings ab.
description.italian: Termina tutte le missioni dell'apprendista macellaio
description.japanese: 肉屋見習いのクエストをすべてクリアする
description.schinese: 完成屠夫学徒的全部任务
description.spanish: Termina todas las misiones de aprendiz de carnicero.

description.brazilian: Conclua o encontro do "Bando de irmãos"
description.french: Terminer la rencontre « Des frères unis ».
description.japanese: 「兄弟の絆」エンカウンタをクリアする
description.spanish: Completa el encuentro Hermanos de sangre.

description.brazilian: Entregue o óleo de fígado de bacalhau para Sally, jogando com o Arthur.
description.french: Donner l'huile de foie de morue à Sally en tant qu'Arthur.
description.german: Bringe Sally als Arthur den Lebertran.
description.italian: Consegna l'olio di fegato di merluzzo a Sally, giocando con Arthur.
description.japanese: アーサーでプレイ中、サリーにタラ肝油を届ける
description.russian: Играя за Артура, отнесите Салли рыбий жир.
description.schinese: 扮演亚瑟，将鱼肝油送给萨利。
description.spanish: Entrega el aceite de hígado de bacalao a Sally como Arthur.

description.brazilian: Entre na vila pela primeira vez.
description.english: Cross into the Village for the first time
description.french: Traverser le village pour la première fois.
description.german: Betritt zum ersten Mal das Village.
description.italian: Attraversa il villaggio per la prima volta.
description.japanese: 初めて村を横断する
description.spanish: Entra en la villa por primera vez.

description.french: Visiter toutes les îles.
description.italian: Metti piede su tutte le isole.
description.japanese: 全ての島に足を踏み入れる
description.spanish: Pon un pie en todos los islotes.

displayName.english: The Importance of Not Being Seen

description.brazilian: Conclua a Casa misteriosa sem te verem
description.english: Finish Mystery House without being spotted once
description.french: Terminer la maison mystérieuse sans vous faire repérer une seule fois.
description.german: Schließe das mysteriöse Haus ab, ohne gesehen zu werden.
description.italian: Completa la Casa misteriosa senza farti mai individuare
description.japanese: 一度も見つからずにミステリーハウスをクリアする
description.russian: Пройти Загадочный дом и ни разу не попасться на глаза посторонним.
description.schinese: 不被发现完成探索神秘屋
description.spanish: Completa la casa de los misterios sin que te descubran ni una vez.

description.brazilian: Na Casa Thomasina – colete todos os gatos falsos
description.english: In Thomasina House - Collect all fake cats
description.french: Dans la Maison Thomasina - Récupérer tous les faux chats.
description.german: In Thomasinas Haus: Sammle alle unechten Katzen.
description.italian: In casa Thomasina, raccogli tutti i gatti finti
description.japanese: トマシーナハウスで全ての偽の猫を回収する
description.russian: Собрать всех фальшивых кошек в доме Томазины.
description.schinese: 在托马斯纳的小屋中——收集所有假猫
description.spanish: Consigue todos los gatos falsos en la casa Thomasina.

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os abrigos do Arthur
description.french: Vous avez débloqué tous les abris d'Arthur.
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i rifugi di Arthur
description.japanese: アーサーの全てのシェルターをアンロックする
description.schinese: 解锁亚瑟所有的避难所。
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los refugios de Arthur.

description.brazilian: Contraia a peste e cure-se dela
description.french: Contracter la peste et se soigner.
description.german: Stecke dich mit der Seuche an und heile sie.
description.japanese: 疫病にかかり治療する
description.russian: Заразиться и найти лекарство от мора.
description.spanish: Contrae la peste y cúrate.

description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo sem matar ninguém diretamente.
description.english: Complete the entire game without directly murdering anyone
description.french: Terminer le jeu sans assassiner quiconque de manière directe.
description.german: Absolviere das gesamte Spiel, ohne irgendjemanden direkt umzubringen.
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza uccidere direttamente nessuno.
description.japanese: 直接誰も殺さずにゲームをクリアする
description.russian: Пройти игру, не убив никого своими руками.
description.schinese: 不直接杀死任何人通关游戏。
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin asesinar a nadie de forma directa.

displayName.japanese: 金持ちになるか、なろうとして死ね
displayName.spanish: Fórrate o muere en el intento

description.brazilian: Obtenha £1.000 saqueando/trocando ao longo do jogo
description.french: Gagner 1 000 £ via les butins/le troc dans toutes les parties.
description.german: Verdiene 1000 £ durch das Plündern/Tauschen in allen Geschichten.
description.italian: Ottieni 1000£ tramite saccheggio e baratto nelle tue partite
description.japanese: 全てのストーリーを合わせて、漁ることまたは取引で£1000を獲得する
description.russian: Найти или заработать торговлей во время прохождения 1000 £.
description.schinese: 在整个游玩过程中通过掠夺或物物交换获得1000
description.spanish: Gana 1000 £ al saquear o regatear en el juego.

displayName.english: Don't You Have Somewhere Else To Be?

description.french: Survivre 50 jours.
description.japanese: 50日間生き延びる
description.spanish: Sobrevive 50 días.

description.french: Mourir d'une overdose de Joy.
description.japanese: ジョイの過剰摂取中に死ぬ
description.spanish: Muere de una sobredosis de júbilo.

description.french: Trouver tous les objets à collectionner.
description.japanese: すべての収集アイテムを見つける
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los coleccionables.

description.brazilian: Colecione todos os episódios do Tio Jack
description.french: Collectionner toutes les émissions de l'Oncle Jack.
description.german: Sammle alle Shows von Onkel Jack.
description.italian: Colleziona tutte le trasmissioni di Zio Jack
description.japanese: アンクル・ジャックの番組をすべて集める
description.schinese: 收集所有杰克叔叔的表演秀
description.spanish: Consigue todos los programas del tío Jack.

displayName.english: Snug as a Bug on a Drug
displayName.french: Placide comme un invalide sous acide
displayName.japanese: 薬にたかる虫のように幸せな気分

description.brazilian: Tome a Alegria logo no começo do jogo
description.english: Take the Joy at the very beginning of the game
description.french: Prendre du Joy au tout début du jeu.
description.german: Nimm die Freude gleich zu Beginn des Spiels.
description.italian: Prendi la Gioia all'inizio del gioco
description.japanese: ゲームの冒頭でジョイを摂取する
description.russian: Принять радостин в самом начале игры.
description.schinese: 在游戏开头就服用快活丸
description.spanish: Toma júbilo al principio de la partida.

description.brazilian: Leia todos os artigos do jornal como Arthur e censure apenas os incômodos.
description.english: Read all newspaper articles as Arthur, and redact only the uncomfortable ones
description.french: Lire tous les articles de journaux avec Arthur, et censurer que les plus gênants.
description.german: Lies als Arthur alle Zeitungsartikel und gib nur die unangenehmen heraus.
description.italian: Leggi tutti gli articoli di giornale nei panni di Arthur e correggi solo quelli spiacevoli.
description.japanese: アーサーですべての新聞記事を読み、心地よくないものだけ編集する。
description.russian: Играя за Артура, прочитать все статьи и отредактировать только те, которые могут вызвать проблемы.
description.schinese: 扮演亚瑟阅读所有报道信息，并且只对会引起不安的部分进行编辑修改。
description.spanish: Lee todos los artículos del periódico como Arthur y censura solo los comprometidos.

description.brazilian: Sabote corretamente o trabalho de Clive Birtwhistle
description.english: Correctly sabotage Clive Birtwhistle's redactor work
description.french: Saboter le travail de rédaction de Clive Birtwhistle.
description.italian: Sabota correttamente il lavoro da redattore di Clive Birtwhistle
description.japanese: クライブ・バートウィッスルの編集ツールに妨害工作をする
description.russian: Успешно испортить редакторскую работу Клайва Бертуисла.
description.schinese: 无误地干扰了克莱夫·帕斯威瑟的减速机的正常运行
description.spanish: Sabotea el trabajo de redacción de Clive Birtwhistle.

description.french: Terminer l'intro d'Arthur.
description.japanese: アーサーのイントロをクリアする
description.spanish: Completa la introducción de Arthur.

displayName.japanese: ジ・アーサー・ヘイスティングス

description.french: Terminer la partie d'Arthur.
description.japanese: アーサーのストーリーをクリアする
description.spanish: Acaba el juego con Arthur.

displayName.japanese: 彼女の尻を追いかけて

description.brazilian: Encontre todos os bilhetes relacionados a Prudence
description.english: Find all notes related to Prudence

description.italian: Trova tutte le note relative a Prudence
description.japanese: プルーデンス関連のメモをすべて発見する
description.russian: Найти все записи, связанные со Скроми.
description.schinese: 找到所有与普登斯有关的记录。
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las notas relacionadas con Prudence.

description.brazilian: Fale com Johnny Bolton da sala de rádio secreta
description.english: Talk to Johnny Bolton from the Secret Radio Room
description.french: Parler à Johnny Bolton depuis la salle radio secrète.
description.german: Sprich mit Johnny Bolton vom geheimen Funkraum.
description.italian: Parla con Johnny Bolton dal locale radio segreto
description.japanese: 秘密の無線室からジョニー・ボルトンと話す
description.russian: Поговорить с Джонни Болтоном из тайной радиорубки.
description.schinese: 与秘密广播室的约翰尼·博尔顿谈话
description.spanish: Habla con Johnny Bolton en la sala de radio secreta.

displayName.japanese: ブレイキング・ブラックベリー
displayName.spanish: Júbilo de mora para las masas

description.french: Terminer l'intro de Sally.
description.japanese: サリーのイントロをクリアする
description.spanish: Completa la introducción de Sally.

displayName.brazilian: Adoro o cheiro de clorofórmio pela manhã
displayName.english: I Love the Smell of Chloroform in the Mornin
displayName.french: J'aime l'odeur du chloroforme au petit matin
displayName.german: Ich liebe den Geruch von Chloroform morgens
displayName.italian: Mi piace l'odore del cloroformio al mattino
displayName.japanese: 朝のクロロホルムの臭いは格別だ
displayName.schinese: 我喜欢清晨时氯仿的味道
displayName.spanish: Adoro el olor del cloroformo por la mañana

description.english: Knock out 50 NPCs with the Atomizer
description.french: Assommer 50 PNJ avec le spray.
description.german: Schlage 50 NSCs mit dem Zerstäuber k.o.
description.italian: Metti KO 50 PNG con il nebulizzatore
description.japanese: スプレーでNPCを50人ノックアウトする
description.russian: Усыпить 50 неигровых персонажей с помощью распылителя.
description.schinese: 使用喷雾器迷晕50名非玩家角色
description.spanish: Deja inconsciente a 50 PNJ con el vaporizador.

description.french: Terminer la rencontre avec les vieilles mégères.
description.japanese: 老婦人のエンカウンタをクリアする

description.brazilian: Conclua a conversa com Verloc na fábrica de Alegria.

description.japanese: ジョイ工場のヴェルロックとの会話を終わらせる

description.spanish: Baila desnudo en la barra
